creator: ognjen.d.blagojevic@gmail.com
text:
Several users, myself included, reported problems when running jsvc from Tomcat 7.0.39, due to DAEMON-291.

If there is no other obstacles, please change commons-daemon dependency from 1.0.14 to 1.0.15.

-Ognjen

creator: mturk@apache.org
text: Fixed in SVN. Will be part of next release
